title: 72 Hours Only: Save $350 on these 20-core M4 MacBook Pros
description: Two of Apple's latest MacBook Pros are heavily discounted exclusively for AppleInsider readers, knocking $350 off the popular M4 Pro configurations for 72 hours only.Save $350 on two popular M4 MacBook Pros - Image credit: AppleYou can opt for the 14-inch or 16-inch MacBook Pro screen size featuring an M4 Pro chip with a 14-core CPU and 20-core GPU. Each laptop has 48GB of memory, double the amount found in the standard M4 Pro model, along with 1TB of storage for enhanced performance and storage space. Continue Reading on AppleInsider | Discuss on our Forums
author: Christine McKee
excerpt: Two of Apple's latest MacBook Pros are heavily discounted exclusively for AppleInsider readers, knocking $350 off the popular M4 Pro configurations for 72 hours only.
text: Two of Apple's latest MacBook Pros are heavily discounted exclusively for AppleInsider readers, knocking $350 off the popular M4 Pro configurations for 72 hours only. You can opt for the 14-inch or 16-inch MacBook Pro screen size featuring an M4 Pro chip with a 14-core CPU and 20-core GPU. Each laptop has 48GB of memory, double the amount found in the standard M4 Pro model, along with 1TB of storage for enhanced performance and storage space. 14" MacBook Pro M4 Pro, 14C CPU, 20C GPU, 48GB RAM, 1TB SSD: $2,449* ($350 off) 16" MacBook Pro M4 Pro, 14C CPU, 20C GPU, 48GB RAM, 1TB SSD: $2,749* ($350 off) The exclusive discounts shave $350 off both models in Space Black, with the 14-inch spec ringing in at $2,449 and the 16-inch variation priced at $2,749. The laptops also come with free 2-day shipping within the contiguous U.S., so you can get your new machine right away. If you're a Payboo cardholder or want to become one, the store card offers an instant sales tax refund in select states or special financing as an added perk. With sales tax reaching 10.35% in some areas, the savings really add up and can deliver another $250 to $285 back on top of the exclusive discount. To activate the offers, you must shop through a laptop or desktop computer in lieu of going through the B&H mobile app. You can find MacBook Pro deals on additional models in our 14-inch MacBook Pro M4 Pro / M4 Max Price Guide and 16-inch MacBook Pro Price Guide, with the deals above ringing in as some of the most aggressive online discounts available.
html:
Two of Apple's latest MacBook Pros are heavily discounted exclusively for AppleInsider readers, knocking $350 off the popular M4 Pro configurations for 72 hours only.

You can opt for the 14-inch or 16-inch MacBook Pro screen size featuring an M4 Pro chip with a 14-core CPU and 20-core GPU. Each laptop has 48GB of memory, double the amount found in the standard M4 Pro model, along with 1TB of storage for enhanced performance and storage space.

  • 14" MacBook Pro M4 Pro, 14C CPU, 20C GPU, 48GB RAM, 1TB SSD: $2,449* ($350 off)
  • 16" MacBook Pro M4 Pro, 14C CPU, 20C GPU, 48GB RAM, 1TB SSD: $2,749* ($350 off)

The exclusive discounts shave $350 off both models in Space Black, with the 14-inch spec ringing in at $2,449 and the 16-inch variation priced at $2,749.

The laptops also come with free 2-day shipping within the contiguous U.S., so you can get your new machine right away.

If you're a Payboo cardholder or want to become one, the store card offers an instant sales tax refund in select states or special financing as an added perk. With sales tax reaching 10.35% in some areas, the savings really add up and can deliver another $250 to $285 back on top of the exclusive discount.

To activate the offers, you must shop through a laptop or desktop computer in lieu of going through the B&H mobile app.

You can find MacBook Pro deals on additional models in our 14-inch MacBook Pro M4 Pro / M4 Max Price Guide and 16-inch MacBook Pro Price Guide, with the deals above ringing in as some of the most aggressive online discounts available.
